column4: can anyone tell me how easy it will be to update my breezy install to dapper. are there advantages to just reinstalling a fresh?
can anyone tell me how easy it will be to update my breezy install to dapper. are there advantages to just reinstalling a fresh?

: some packages you installed might be not willing to be updated to dapper, so they may get deleted while you're updating. Installation a clean dapper is certainly the best way to go if you want to get something clean and fast.
